description: Feeble. You're getting old.
You hit Foes forehead.
Push foe with the punch. You receive initiative next round.
Foe steps aside unbalanced.You gain the initiative next round.
Good placement. You gain the initiative for the next two rounds.
Slight abrasion. You gain the initiative for the next two rounds.
Glancing blow to Foes back. You gain the initiative for the next three rounds.
Strike lands solid to the chest. Foe leaps back on the defensive.
Foe kicks out at you and you strike his leg in response.
Arm strike gives foe a bruised bicep. You are cruel.
Grapple Foes weapon arm and jerk his weapon free. Foe goes twisting and spinning out of your grasp.
Blow to abdomen. Foe bends over and throws up.
Leg strike damages muscle and sends foe stumbling back.
Blow to Foes shield arm. If foe has anything that resembles a shield, it is broken.
Precision strike to Foes arm disarms him. Weapon hand is fractured. Foe is in pain.
Two brutal punches to Foes face. This barrage leaves foe confused and swinging in the wrong direction.
Head strike breaks Foes nose. Appearance drops by 5 due to black eyes.
Blow to solar plexus causes foe to vomit. He falls to his knees. Foe is unable to do anything but retch. Do you have pity?
Elbow Foes face and then punch him hard. He is paralyzed from the neck down for 2 days. He falls instantly to the ground.
Maybe next time.â€¦
A glancing blow.
Deflected blow, but you gain the initiative next round.
Your backhand is powerful. Strike foe across his face.You unbalance him.
Push foe back and kick his leg. You gain the initiative next round.
Leg strike unsteadies foe. You stomp Foes feet for an extra advantage.
Foe lunges past you and you come down on his back. He realizes his pain.
You strike foe in his chest. Foe reels.
You duck down and strike across at foe. Blow to thigh leaves a bad bruise.
You block Foes guard and punch him in the face. He just stands there.
Hammer foe in his kidneys. You know he is in pain. He grips his side and falls down. Finish him, the pain will not last.
Blow to Foes chest. You have mastered the common punch.
Calf strike delivers a deep bruise. Foe looks down at the damage, forgetting about you.
You snap Foes arm around like a noodle. His wrist is strained with the impact.
Hand strike jams Foes fingers into their sockets. Ouch! Foe drops everything in his hands.
Grab Foes weapon arm and beat on it without concern for the rest of foe. Foe is disarmed as ligaments are torn and muscles are pulled.
Land a solid shot to Foes head. Foe is definitely impressed. He steps toward you to keep from falling.
Groin strike is solid. You kick him again. Your strike leaves foe helpless. Really unkind.
Strike to Foes head. If he has no helm, he is in a coma for 10-100 days. If foe has a helm it leaves a bruise on his head. Foe drops and is unconscious.
Barely made it.
You pull at Foes hair.
You move quickly after blocking punch.You gain the initiative next round.
Step into foe to knock him down. Bash to side unbalances foe.
You try to sweep your foe off his feet.
Boot to calf hits hard. You have the initiative next round.
You grab foe and bring your knee into Foes side. Strike lifts foe up and sends foe reeling.
Classic grip to Foes collar garment. You punch him hard. He stumbles back 5 feet.
Strike to Foes thigh. Your fist hits hard.
Catch weapon arm and strike it across your own knee. Foe drops his weapon.
Nasty strike to Foes mouth knocks out 2 teeth and reduces Foes appearance, by 5 when he smiles.
Strong blow to Foes forearm causes fracture.
A light punch unbalances foe. A kick to Foes leg knocks him down. He falls forward under you.
Grip Foes weapon arm and drive his fist against a hard surface. Hand is fractured. Foe is disarmed.
Strong blow to Foes arm fractures shoulder. You hit his shoulder one more time to make your point.
Accurate chest strike knocks wind out of foe. He falls over on you and you knock him off with an upper cut. He stand back up and stumbles 5 feet.
Precision strike to Foes head sends him to the ground. You can actually see the stars spinning around his head.
Strike foe in his head. If he has a helm, you pull it off and hit him with it. He is knocked out for 4 hours. If foe has no helm, you knock him out for 5 rounds.
Mighty strike crashes into Foes head. If he has a helmet, he is unconscious for 1-10 days. If he has no helmet, skull collapses and brain is dead.
Great move.
You gain the initiative next round.
Use your body like a broom. Foe is unbalanced.
Elbow to Foes side sends him reeling. Your follow-up swing misses.
You trip foe. He shuffles a full 15 feet before he gets his balance.
You go in low and strike foe in his calf. He stumbles back with a nasty bruise.
Pull foe off balance and hammer him in the back with a solid fist.
Chest strike causes deep bruise. Foe looks very surprised.
Bring your forearm down on Foes thigh, with most of your weight behind it. You have the initiative next round.
Strike to nerve in Foes upper arm causes him to drop whatever he is carrying.
Drive your finger into Foes eye, causing blindness. There is a 10% chance that this affliction is permanent.
Smash Foes hip. You have the initiative next round.
Leg strike causes foe to fall. You push him to hinder his landing and he sprains his ankle.
Strong blow to Foes weapon arm fractures his wrist. The pain makes his hand useless.
Grab Foes weapon arm and pull him over. Your kick to the ribs finally drops him to the ground.
Blow to front of Foes neck. His head snaps back, but it does not break his neck. Foe cannot speak for 2-20 hours. He yells in silence.
Strong blow to face cracks jawbone. Ow! Jaw is stuck open and foe appears permanently surprised about something.
Strong blow to the abdomen causes internal bleeding and organ damage. Foe makes it a habit of spitting blood.
Grip Foes arm and pound on Foes head. One shot hits hard. Crushing strike to Foes temple. Foe dies instantly.
Light blow, but Foes thinks it's your best.
Things just failed to connect right.
You block Foes forearm. You gain the initiative next round.
Duck in close and hammer Foes side. You gain the initiative next round.
Cheap shot to Foes side bruises ribs. Foe crashes into the nearest obstacle.
Strike to the back of Foes leg gives you a back attack next round.
You bash foe brutally. Your strike is solid.
Chest wound knocks foe down. Your attack puts you in the place he was just standing.
You do not know what a sweep or a throw is, but this surely seems like one. You slam foe to the ground.
Strong shoulder strike and a follow-up strike to the face.
Face strike is so hard Foes cheekbone is shattered. The shards mortally wound foe. He dies after 10 rounds of agony.
Throw foe into a solid object. He falls down.
Snap palm into place against Foes knee. Tendon and cartilage damage. Foe has difficulty standing.
Fierce blow to Foes weapon arm breaks bone. Arm is useless. Use arm as leverage to flip foe onto his stomach.
Shoulder strike breaks Foes collar bone. Miscellaneous internal organ damage.
Nasty blow ruptures stomach. Foe is knocked down. Internal bleeding is mortal. Foe will die in 20 rounds. He is still active.
Blow to Foes side. Bruise ribs, a kidney and a lung. Foe manages to remain standing. Oh that hurts ya know!
Grip Foes neck. You shake him violently, while attempting to choke him. He passes out. You can finish him if you want.
Your strike is frightening. Foes head snaps to one side. Foe cannot breathe. He looks upon the world one last time and then dies. You are horrified at his doom.
